name: Knockout Station 64
description:
Hello world! I've done a little beat 'em up on the snowy tiny station. There are nine waves (up to three foes at once) and three type of enemies. You can punch, you can jump and roll to dodge attacks. Game by Cptn Sigh. Music track – "A Ghrà" by Damiano Baldoni. Have fun!

                           KeyboardController (Xbox)Walk
Right and Left ArrowsLeft StickJumpUp ArrowARollDown ArrowBPunchSpaceXRestartEscapeStartQuitQBack
  • Jump to skip intro
  • WASD + Space works as well!
  • You can also change zoom with Minus and Equal
